review_text: I have severe anxiety and insomnia. So, this stuff is great. Sometimes I have a small dosage to stave off panic attacks and such while at other times I will take more so that I can sleep. The ingredients are high quality. However, I find this to be very expensive for its size. Nevertheless, it works beautifully and tastes really good.

review_title: There was no effect on sleep.
review_text: I recently bought it because I thought that I could help sleeping, but I could not sleep. I usually get used to drinking such herbal essence, or even if I rinse my mouth I was concerned about the smell like lavender that remained in my throat, it took as much as two hours, as usual, to sleep until I got to bed. Perhaps there is some relaxation effect. . .
